data: “_To my son Hugh, in return for the care and sorrow he has caused me all the days of his life, for his dissolute career and his desertion, I do give and bequeath the sum of one thousand dollars and the memory of his misspent youth._”
bestsellers, american, 1895-1923|browsing: culture/civilization/society|browsing: literature|browsing: fiction|category: novels|category: american literature
